translations: 使颠倒，倒放；（水中的鸭或其他鸟捕食时头部与前腹部潜入水中，尾部翘起）倒栽葱；（使某人）跌倒，翻转；（足球赛中）故意绊倒，铲倒（对方队员）

sentences.sentence: More Americans are opting to work well into retirement, a growing trend that threatens to upend the old workforce model.
sentences.translation: 越来越多的美国人选择退休后继续工作，这一增长趋势可能会颠覆旧有的劳动力模式。

sentences.sentence: In the movies and on television, artificial intelligence is typically depicted as something sinister that will upend our way of life.
sentences.translation: 在电影和电视中，人工智能通常被描绘成一种将颠覆我们生活方式的邪恶事物。

sentences.sentence: If you upend the box it will take less space.
sentences.translation: 如果你将盒子竖起来，它就可以少占些空间。
